before: int f(Item *a, int n){ int x=0; for(int i=0;i<n;i++){ x += a[i].count; } return x; }
after: int f(Item *items, int item_count){ int total_count = 0; for (int index = 0; index < item_count; ++index) { total_count += items[index].count; } return total_count; }
why_safe: Only parameter/local variable names changed for readability; behavior unchanged.

before: static int c(User *u){ return u != NULL && u->is_active && !u->is_blocked; }
after: static int can_user_proceed(User *user){ return user != NULL && user->is_active && !user->is_blocked; }
why_safe: Static helper and parameter renamed only; condition logic unchanged.
